meanings.definition: Having a tendency to adhere or cling
meanings.sent1: The honey was stickier than the syrup.
meanings.sent2: The tape became stickier as it aged.
meanings.sent3: The glue seemed to have a stickier day than usual.
meanings.sent4: The situation grew stickier as more people got involved.
meanings.sent5: The mud on the trail was stickier than expected, making it hard to walk.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to cause something to adhere or cling
